{
    "name": "AI Assistant",
    "system_prompt": "Answer questions truthfully.",
    "image_url": "https://example.com/chatbot-image.png",
    "theme": "light",
    "subtitle": "Your friendly AI",
    "description": "An AI chatbot to assist users with queries.",
    "warning_message": "Please verify information from official sources.",
    "chat_history_size": 10,
    "index_search_size": 6,
    "index_result_distance": 10,
    "active": true,
    "interactive": true,
    "local_llm_instance_id": 1,
    "llm_settings": {
        "temperature": 1,
        "top_p": 1,
        "presence_penalty": 0,
        "frequency_penalty": 0,
        "max_token": 128000
    },
    "index_settings": {
        "chunk_size": 4096,
        "chunk_overlap": 256
    }
}

{
    "name": "AI Assistant",
    "system_prompt": "You are a financial expert that analyzes the financial documents provided by a fund company. You need to extract the following information from the given context; Fund Name, Execution Date of the Credit, Security, Agent Bank, Current size of the credit, Tenor, Maturity Date, Benchmark 1, Margin, Benchmark 2, Margin 2, Arrangement Fee (Annual %), Non-UT/Commitment Fee, Type of Facility. All of these are columns for the table. If you cannot find a data in the given context, indicate that with N/A or N/D (Non Disclosed). Data needs to be accurate, so think about it carefully before presenting it. If calculations are needed to derive certain data, make sure to do them. Arrangement Fee (Annual %) usually needs it, so be careful with that one. Present the data in a table.",
    "image_url": "https://example.com/chatbot-image.png",
    "theme": "light",
    "subtitle": "Your friendly AI",
    "description": "An AI chatbot to assist users with queries.",
    "warning_message": "Please verify information from official sources.",
    "index_id": 1,
    "chat_history_size": 10,
    "index_search_size": 6,
    "index_result_distance": 10,
    "active": true,
    "interactive": true,
    "local_llm_instance_id":1,
    "llm_settings": {
        "temperature": 1,
        "top_p": 1,
        "presence_penalty": 0,
        "frequency_penalty": 0,
        "max_token": 128000
    },
    "index_settings": {
        "chunk_size": 4096,
        "chunk_overlap": 256
    }
}

{
    "image_url": "test_url",
